ComicInfo.Summary:
Angel survives the shooting, but a lot of the people at the Erection Club, including the guy named Guy, are killed. Angered and convinced that this is connected to the Bambi murder, Angel questions Bahbi Ganoozsh, Doctor Destrowitz and his nurse Derma, and Don Quixote. The latter points them to Arthur Pendragon, who, upon being revealed to have an obscene obsession with Bambi, confesses to be guilty with the murder.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/angel-and-the-ape-2-death-becomes-her/4000-51376/

ComicInfo.Title: Death Becomes Her
